Title: The Paradox of Choice.
Subtitle: Why More Is Less.
Authors: Barry Schwartz.
Categories: Business & Economics.
Thumbnail: .
Description: The author of The Battle for Human Nature explains why too much choice has led to the ever increasing complexity of everyday decisions, why too much of a good thing has become detrimental to human psychological and emotional well-being, and how to focus our lives on making the right choices.
